# Read in .Rds data file will all campaign finance data
```{r}
LA_contributions <- 
  read_rds(LA_contributions_file) %>% 
  mutate(ContributionAmt = str_replace(ContributionAmt, "\\$", "")) %>% 
  mutate(ContributionAmt = as.numeric(ContributionAmt))
```


```{r}
LA_contributions %>% select(ReportType) %>% group_by(ReportType) %>% count() %>% arrange(desc(n)) 
```

```{r}
company_donations <-
  LA_contributions %>%
  filter(str_detect(ContributorName, "STANTEC|USDA|STANTON|AECOM|GEC INC|GHD INC|LOUISIANA DIVERSION COMPANY|LAFITTE|US DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE")) %>% 
  group_by(ContributorName) %>% 
  summarize(total_cont = sum(ContributionAmt, na.rm = TRUE))
```
